home.h1: Catalog of Books: A website that you can search for books using the 'Google Books API'.
home.paragraph: How does it work? Very simple! In the navbar you will find two buttons, in 'Books' you can search for a specific book and in 'Authors' you see a list with all the authors.

comments.name: Guilherme Girardi
comments.comment: Awesome website! It helps me a lot!!! It's easy to understand and to search for good books.

comments.name: Joe Doe
comments.comment: I'd strongly recommend it without any questions. I use it at least 3 times a month!

comments.name: Joe Doe Doe
comments.comment: I recommend this website for all my friends. Nobody ever made a complaint to me! xD

comments.name: Lua Girardi
comments.comment: Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!Awesome website!
